did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Massachusetts Foot and Mouth Disease Eradication Program photograph album,
1903
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One photo album documenting the Massachusetts Foot and Mouth Disease Eradication Program of 1903. The creator of the album is unknown.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One photo album documenting the Massachusetts Foot and Mouth Disease Eradication Program of 1903. The creator of the album is unknown, but a notation in the album indicates that their last name may have been Fink.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Massachusetts Foot and Mouth Disease Eradication Program Photograph Album, #6597. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

acqinfo.head: PROVENANCE
acqinfo.p: Transfered by the Flower Sprecher Veterinary Library to the Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections in 2004
